alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Lucie County through 500 PM EDT... At 425 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Saint Lucie Airport, or near Indrio, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Indrio, Fort Pierce Inlet, Queens Cove and Fort Pierce North. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie
